meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Shelly Green Mike McStravick Julie Bratvold Ghanbari Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6424.

td.p: Shelly Green, a medical malpractice attorney from Woodmere, New York
Mike McStravick, a homicide detective from Houston, Texas
Julie Bratvold Ghanbari, a stay-at-home mom from San Diego, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,001)

tr.td: PUT ME IN, MOVIE COACH!
BOOKS & AUTHORS
MONEY TALKS
EARLY AMERICA
PHOTOGRAPHY
RHYME HUB

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Alex: Yes, Tom Hanks.)

A League of Their Own

Shelly
')
